polyline.style: stroke-linecap: square; fill: rgb(36, 168, 91); stroke: rgb(255, 255, 153); stroke-width: 50px;

line.style: fill: rgb(105, 166, 63); stroke-linecap: square; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 153); stroke-width: 50px;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 153); stroke-width: 17px;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 153); stroke-width: 17px;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 153); stroke-width: 17px;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 153); stroke-width: 17px;
